news_title: Ripple targets RLUSD expansion to Layer 2 networks with Wormhole
news_subtitle: Ripple expands RLUSD to multiple L2s via Wormhole in 2026. Targets 24/7 trading liquidity across regulated, high-utility chains. Holds $1B+ supply and new $500M funding round. Ripple says RLUSD will extend beyond XRP Ledger and Ethereum and reach multiple Layer 2 networks in 2026...

news_title: ETHGas Raises $12M to Launch Ethereum Blockspace Market
news_subtitle: ETHGas secures $12M seed round and $800M commitments to create a liquid, programmable Ethereum blockspace market. Blockspace futures enable pre-confirmations, high-throughput execution, and reduced gas volatility for developers and users. Open Gas Initiative sponsors gas for 127,...

news_title: Ethereum could get faster in January with gas limit rise to 80M
news_subtitle: Ethereum could become faster in the new year with the gas limit expected to rise from 60 million to 80 million following the next blob parameter-only hard fork on Jan. 7.

news_title: Ethereum Gas Limit Increase Could Boost Speeds in January
news_subtitle: Ethereum may boost speeds in January with an 80M gas limit after the blob parameter hard fork! Faster transactions ahead. #Ethereum #GasLimit #Crypto The post Ethereum Gas Limit Increase Could Boost Speeds in January appeared first on CoinoMedia.
